snippet: Anthony D. Weiner already ranks among the leading Democratic candidates in the race, trailing only Christine C. Quinn, in a poll of voters released on Tuesday.
abstract: NBC New York and Marist College poll shows Anthony D Weiner, who has not yet said he will run for New York City mayor, already ranks among leading Democratic candidates, trailing only Christine C Quinn; showing puts Weiner, who resigned his House seat in 2011 after scandal involving lewd online behavior, into statistical tie with other contenders who have sought office for months.
lead_paragraph: Anthony D. Weiner already ranks among the leading Democratic candidates in the race, trailing only Christine C. Quinn, in a poll of voters released on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Weiner Hasn’t Joined Race for Mayor, but a Poll of Democrats Puts Him in Second
headline.main: Weiner Hasn’t Joined Race for Mayor, but a Poll of Democrats Puts Him in Second
headline.print_headline: Weiner Hasn’t Joined Race for Mayor, but a Poll of Democrats Puts Him in Second
